delegate","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"applySigned(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,address)":{"details":"Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry","params":{"_newMember":"The address of the new signature"}},"applySignedWithAttribute(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,address,bytes32,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry and add off chain data to the Should be a string less than 32 bytes, converted to bytes32. example: 'ProjectData' = 0x50726f6a65637444617461, with zeros appended to make it 32 bytes. (add 42 zeros)","_offChainDataValidity":"Length of time attribute data is valid","_offChainDataValue":"Attribute data stored offchain (such as IPFS)","_owner":"Owner of the member application","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"applySignedWithAttributeAndDelegate(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,address,address,uint256,bytes32,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry and add off chain data  and a delegate to the DID registry","params":{"_delegate":"Delegate designated for the member","_delegateValidity":"Time delegate is valid","_newMember":"The address of the new member","_offChainDataName":"Attribute name. Should be a string less than 32 bytes, converted to bytes32. example: 'ProjectData' = 0x50726f6a65637444617461 with zeros appended to make it 32 bytes","_offChainDataValidity":"Length of time attribute data is valid","_offChainDataValue":"Attribute data stored offchain (such as IPFS)","_owner":"Owner of the member application","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"applySignedWithDelegate(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry and add a delegate to the DID registry","params":{"_delegate":"Delegate designated for the member","_delegateValidity":"Time delegate is valid","_newMember":"The address of the new member","_owner":"Owner of the member application","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"challenge(address,address,bytes32)":{"details":"Starts a challenge on a member. Challenger deposits a fee.","params":{"_challengedMember":"The memberName of the member being challenged","_challengingMember":"The memberName of the member who is challenging another member","_details":"Extra details relevant to the challenge. (IPFS hash without Qm)"}},"challengeCanBeResolved(uint256)":{"details":"Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given member. Throws if challenge can't be resolved","params":{"_challengeID":"The challenge ID"}},"changeOwnerSigned(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,address)":{"details":"Allows a member owner to be edited. Only owner can call","params":{"_member":"The address of the member","_newOwner":"The new owner of the membership","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"editOffChainDataSigned(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Allows offChainData to be edited by the owner or delegate. To revoke an attribute, just pass a validity of 0. There is no need to wrap the revokeAttribute function in ERC-1056.","params":{"_member":"The address of the member","_offChainDataName":"Attribute name. Should be a string less than 32 bytes, converted to bytes32. example: 'ProjectData' = 0x50726f6a65637444617461 with zeros appended to make it 32 bytes","_offChainDataValidity":"Length of time attribute data is valid","_offChainDataValue":"Attribute data stored offchain (such as IPFS)","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"hasVotingPeriodExpired(uint256)":{"details":"Returns true if a challenge vote period has finished","params":{"_endTime":"The starting period of the challenge"}},"isMember(address)":{"details":"Returns true if the address is a member","params":{"_member":"The member name of the member whose status is to be examined"}},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"memberChallengeExists(address)":{"details":"Returns true if the member has an unresolved challenge. False if the challenge does not exist.","params":{"_member":"The member that is being checked for a challenge."}},"memberExit(address)":{"details":"Allow a member to voluntarily leave. Note that this does not reset ownership or delegates in the ERC-1056 registry. This must be done by calling the respective functions in the registry that handle those resets.","params":{"_member":"Member exiting the list"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"resolveChallenge(uint256)":{"details":"Resolve a challenge. Anyone can call this function. A successful challenge means the member is removed.","params":{"_challengeID":"The challenge ID"}},"revokeDelegateSigned(address,address,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Allows a member delegate to be revoked","params":{"_delegate":"The delegate being removed","_member":"The address of the member","_sigR":"R piece of the member signature","_sigS":"S piece of the member signature","_sigV":"V piece of the member signature"}},"submitVote(uint256,uint8,address)":{"details":"Submit a vote. Owner or delegate can submit","params":{"_challengeID":"The challenge ID","_voteChoice":"The vote choice (yes or no)","_voter":"The member who is voting"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateCharter(bytes32)":{"details":"Allows the owner of Everest to update the charter in the memberRegistry","params":{"_newCharter":"The data that links to the new charter offchain"}},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"details":"Allows the owner of everest to withdraw funds from the reserve bank in the case of an emergency, or an upgrade from V1. addDelegateSigned(address,uint8,bytes32,.details: Allows a delegate to be added (there can be multiple delegates)

params._delegateValidity: The time the new delegate is valid
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

applySigned(address,uint8,bytes32,bytes3.details: Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry

params._newMember: The address of the new member
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

applySignedWithAttribute(address,uint8,b.details: Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry and add off chain data to the DID registry

params._newMember: The address of the new member
params._offChainDataName: Attribute name. Should be a string less than 32 bytes, converted to bytes32. example: 'ProjectData' = 0x50726f6a65637444617461, with zeros appended to make it 32 bytes. (add 42 zeros)
params._offChainDataValidity: Length of time attribute data is valid
params._offChainDataValue: Attribute data stored offchain (such as IPFS)
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

applySignedWithAttributeAndDelegate(addr.details: Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry and add off chain data  and a delegate to the DID registry

params._newMember: The address of the new member
params._offChainDataName: Attribute name. Should be a string less than 32 bytes, converted to bytes32. example: 'ProjectData' = 0x50726f6a65637444617461 with zeros appended to make it 32 bytes
params._offChainDataValidity: Length of time attribute data is valid
params._offChainDataValue: Attribute data stored offchain (such as IPFS)
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

applySignedWithDelegate(address,uint8,by.details: Allows a user to apply to add a member to the Registry and add a delegate to the DID registry

params._newMember: The address of the new member
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

challenge(address,address,bytes32).details: Starts a challenge on a member. Challenger deposits a fee.

params._challengedMember: The memberName of the member being challenged
params._challengingMember: The memberName of the member who is challenging another member
params._details: Extra details relevant to the challenge. (IPFS hash without Qm)

challengeCanBeResolved(uint256).details: Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given member. Throws if challenge can't be resolved

changeOwnerSigned(address,uint8,bytes32,.details: Allows a member owner to be edited. Only owner can call

params._newOwner: The new owner of the membership
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

editOffChainDataSigned(address,uint8,byt.details: Allows offChainData to be edited by the owner or delegate. To revoke an attribute, just pass a validity of 0. There is no need to wrap the revokeAttribute function in ERC-1056.

params._offChainDataName: Attribute name. Should be a string less than 32 bytes, converted to bytes32. example: 'ProjectData' = 0x50726f6a65637444617461 with zeros appended to make it 32 bytes
params._offChainDataValidity: Length of time attribute data is valid
params._offChainDataValue: Attribute data stored offchain (such as IPFS)
params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

hasVotingPeriodExpired(uint256).details: Returns true if a challenge vote period has finished

params._endTime: The starting period of the challenge

isMember(address).details: Returns true if the address is a member

params._member: The member name of the member whose status is to be examined

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

memberChallengeExists(address).details: Returns true if the member has an unresolved challenge. False if the challenge does not exist.

params._member: The member that is being checked for a challenge.

memberExit(address).details: Allow a member to voluntarily leave. Note that this does not reset ownership or delegates in the ERC-1056 registry. This must be done by calling the respective functions in the registry that handle those resets.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resolveChallenge(uint256).details: Resolve a challenge. Anyone can call this function. A successful challenge means the member is removed.

revokeDelegateSigned(address,address,uin.details: Allows a member delegate to be revoked

params._sigR: R piece of the member signature
params._sigS: S piece of the member signature
params._sigV: V piece of the member signature

submitVote(uint256,uint8,address).details: Submit a vote. Owner or delegate can submit

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateCharter(bytes32).details: Allows the owner of Everest to update the charter in the memberRegistry

params._newCharter: The data that links to the new charter offchain

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner of everest to withdraw funds from the reserve bank in the case of an emergency, or an upgrade from V1. With plans to decentralize this functionality in the future.

params._amount: The amount of funds being withdrawn
